          <title>
            <string language="en">Knowledge in Action, Write Better</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissen in der Tätigkeit, schreibt besser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La connaissance dans l'action, écrivent mieux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O conhecimento na ação, escreve mais melhor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La conoscenza nell'azione, scrive più meglio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γνώση στην ενέργεια, γράφει καλύτερα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El conocimiento en la acción, escribe mejor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Materials emphasizing ways to improve writing skills.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Materialien, die Methoden hervorheben, Schreiben 
Fähigkeiten zu verbessern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériaux soulignant des voies d'améliorer des 
qualifications d'écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Materiais que emfatizam maneiras melhorar 
habilidades da escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiali che danno risalto ai modi migliorare le 
abilità di scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υλικά που υπογραμμίζουν τους τρόπους να βελτιωθούν οι 
δεξιότητες σύνταξης εγγράφου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Materiales que acentúan maneras de mejorar 
habilidades de la escritura.</string>
          </description>
